contents.Text: You can add album art to a entire folder by making a file in the folder called 'album_art.png'.
Alternatively: You can add album art directory called 'album_art' and any images with the supported formats will be randomised and used as album art.
Supported formats are (png, jpg, jpeg, webp).
Recommended image is 'png' as this is what the other formats are converted to internally.
